attributes.action: Regular Eye Sight Checks for UK Drivers
attributes.additional_details:
There are currently no required eyesight or physical checks to renew your driving licence. Even at 70 the renewal is by self-certification.

What we would like to see:
        * An Opticians Certificate to renew your Licence (modern licences are renewed every 10 years)
        * A Qualified Medical Check for those aged 70+ to renew their licence.
        * A minimum of 2 hours Driving Assessment every 10 years required to retain a licence.
        * A Qualified Driving Assessment for those aged 70+ to renew their licence.
